# Specific Armors and Shields
## Overview
**Minor Specific Armors**




| ** d%** | **Special Ability** | **Base Price Modifier** |
|---|---|---|
| 01–50 | Mithral shirt | 1,100 gp |
| 51–80 | [[Dragonhide Plate\|Dragonhide plate]] | 3,300 gp |
| 81–100 | [[Elven Chain\|Elven chain]] | 5,150 gp |

**Medium Specific Armors**




| ** d%** | **Special Ability** | **Base Price Modifier** |
|---|---|---|
| 01–25 | Mithral shirt | 1,100 gp |
| 26–45 | [[Dragonhide Plate\|Dragonhide plate]] | 3,300 gp |
| 46–57 | [[Elven Chain\|Elven chain]] | 5,150 gp |
| 58–67 | *[[Rhino Hide\|Rhino hide]]* | 5,165 gp |
| 68–82 | [[Adamantine Breastplate\|Adamantine breastplate]] | 10,200 gp |
| 83–97 | [[Dwarven Plate\|Dwarven plate]] | 16,500 gp |
| 98–100 | [[Banded Mail of Luck\|Banded mail of luck]] | 18,900 gp |

**Major Specific Armors**




| ** d%** | **Special Ability** | **Base Price Modifier** |
|---|---|---|
| 01–10 | [[Adamantine Breastplate\|Adamantine breastplate]] | 10,200 gp |
| 11–20 | [[Dwarven Plate\|Dwarven plate]] | 16,500 gp |
| 21–32 | [[Banded Mail of Luck\|Banded mail of luck]] | 18,900 gp |
| 33–50 | *[[Celestial Armor\|Celestial armor]]* | 22,400 gp |
| 51–60 | *Plate armor* *of the deep* | 24,650 gp |
| 61–75 | [[Breastplate of Command\|Breastplate of command]] | 25,400 gp |
| 76–90 | *Mithral full plate of speed* | 26,500 gp |
| 91–100 | *[[Demon Armor\|Demon armor]]* | 52,260 gp |

**Minor Specific Shields**




| ** d%** | **Special Ability** | **Base Price Modifier** |
|---|---|---|
| 01–30 | Darkwood buckler | 205 gp |
| 31–80 | Darkwood shield | 257 gp |
| 81–95 | Mithral heavy shield | 1,020 gp |
| 96–100 | *Caster’s shield* | 3,153 gp |

**Medium Specific Shields**




| ** d%** | **Special Ability** | **Base Price Modifier** |
|---|---|---|
| 01–20 | Darkwood buckler | 205 gp |
| 21–45 | Darkwood shield | 257 gp |
| 46–70 | Mithral heavy shield | 1,020 gp |
| 71–85 | *Caster’s shield* | 3,153 gp |
| 86–90 | *Spined shield* | 5,580 gp |
| 91–95 | *Lion’s shield* | 9,170 gp |
| 96–100 | *Winged shield* | 17,257 gp |

**Major Specific Shields**




| ** d%** | **Special Ability** | **Base Price Modifier** |
|---|---|---|
| 01–20 | *Caster’s shield* | 3,153 gp |
| 21–40 | *Spined shield* | 5,580 gp |
| 41–60 | *Lion’s shield* | 9,170 gp |
| 61–90 | *Winged shield* | 17,257 gp |
| 91–100 | *Absorbing shield* | 50,170 gp |
